item.title: 阿克苏诺贝尔将裁员目标提高至2200人，预计2025年将关闭更多工厂
item.description: 多乐士（Dulux）涂料生产商阿克苏诺贝尔（Akzo Nobel）周三表示，作为重组工作的一部分，该公司预计将裁员约2200人，并在2025年至少再关闭五个生产基地。【原文：Akzo Nobel expects to cut around 2,200 jobs and to close at least five more sites in 2025 as part of its restructuring efforts, the Dulux paints maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Haleon 将向美国研发中心投资 5,400 万美元，以促进产品创新
item.description: 消费保健品公司 Haleon 周三表示，将向其位于美国里士满的全球研发中心投资 5400 万美元，以促进新产品创新。【原文：Consumer healthcare company Haleon said on Wednesday it will invest $54 million in its global research and development centre in Richmond, U.S., aiming to boost its pipeline for new product innovations.】

item.title: 华尔街为炼油企业第四季度盈利下降和关税计划做好准备
item.description: 由于燃料需求疲软，华尔街正在为美国炼油企业第四季度利润大幅下滑做准备，同时也在寻求该行业为应对唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁对从加拿大和墨西哥进口的原油征收关税所做准备的清晰度。【原文：Wall Street is bracing for a sharp decline in U.S. oil refiners' fourth-quarter profits as fuel demand softened, while seeking clarity on the sector's preparations for President Donald Trump's threatened tariffs on crude imports from Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 淡水河谷首席执行官会见巴西总统卢拉，吹嘘与政府议程 "趋同
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷首席执行官周二与巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦举行了首次正式会晤，他在会晤中强调，淡水河谷的项目与巴西的发展议程 "高度一致"。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale's CEO held his first official meeting with President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Tuesday, the company said, where he highlighted that there was "enormous convergence" between its projects and the country's development agenda.】

item.title: 早间竞价：关注 "Mag7"、美联储会议和加拿大减产，科技股反弹
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 在投资者压力下，2024 年全球首席执行官离职人数创历史新高
item.description: 领导力咨询公司罗素-雷诺兹咨询公司（Russell Reynolds Associates）的数据显示，去年全球公司首席执行官离职人数创下新高，原因是投资者的严格审查和跟上变革的压力。【原文：Chief executives of global companies left their jobs in record numbers last year, pushed by intense scrutiny from investors and pressure to keep up with change, according to leadership advisory firm Russell Reynolds Associates.】

item.title: 人工智能股震荡可能引发美国市场更广泛的上涨
item.description: 人工智能领域的一项发展令资产价格错开，这可能有助于为推动市场走高的科技股之外的更广泛的股票走强创造条件。【原文：A development in the field of artificial intelligence that staggered asset prices could help set the stage for broader stock strength beyond the narrow group of technology shares that has propelled the market higher.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，本田将因发动机熄火问题在美国召回超过 29 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，本田公司将在美国召回294,612辆汽车，原因是燃油喷射电子控制单元存在软件错误，可能导致发动机熄火或失去动力。【原文：Honda will recall 294,612 vehicles in the U.S. over concerns engines may stall or suffer a loss of power due to a software error in the fuel injection electronic control unit, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加拿大央行最有可能在周三降息 25 个基点
item.description: 加拿大央行几乎肯定会在周三将其关键政策利率下调 25 个基点，因为从潜在的跨境关税到降低人口目标等一系列因素使得经济前景持续低迷。【原文：The Bank of Canada is almost certain to trim its key policy rate by 25 basis points on Wednesday as a slew of factors, from potential cross-border tariffs to a reduced population target, keep the outlook for the economy muted.】

item.title: 美联储可能维持利率稳定，等待更多数据和特朗普政策的明朗化
item.description: 预计美联储将在周三维持利率稳定，等待进一步的通胀和就业数据，以及总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策对经济影响的进一步明朗化，然后再决定是否再次削减借贷成本。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday as it awaits further inflation and jobs data and more clarity on the economic impact of President Donald Trump's policies before deciding whether to cut borrowing costs again.】

item.title: 苹果销售额可能因人工智能延迟和中国竞争而受损
item.description: 预计苹果公司周四将公布不温不火的季度营收增长报告，原因是其人工智能功能的缓慢推出和中国市场的激烈竞争影响了关键假日购物季对 iPhone 的需求。【原文：Apple is expected to report tepid quarterly revenue growth on Thursday as its slow roll-out of artificial intelligence features and tough Chinese competition weighed on iPhone demand during the crucial holiday-shopping season.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，KKR 增持亨利-申（Henry Schein）股份，达成董事会席位协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，私募股权公司 KKR 已大量入股 Henry Schein，并计划与这家医疗产品分销商合作改善其运营状况。【原文：Private equity firm KKR has taken a large stake in Henry Schein and plans to work with the distributor of medical products to improve its operations, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官人选成焦点 芯片制造商营收将下降
item.description: 英特尔周四公布季度业绩报告时，将面临投资者对其首席执行官人选的审查，因为这家芯片制造商面临着因个人电脑销售疲软和数据中心市场份额萎缩而导致的营收再次大幅下滑。【原文：Intel will face investor scrutiny on its CEO search when it reports quarterly results on Thursday, as the chipmaker stares at another big decline in revenue due to weak PC sales and its shrinking share in the datacenter market.】

item.title: 纳斯达克期货上涨，芯片股在美联储决议前上涨
item.description: 与纳斯达克指数挂钩的期货周三上涨，原因是芯片设备制造商 ASML 的季度订单超过预期，半导体相关股票上涨。【原文：Futures tied to the Nasdaq gained on Wednesday as semiconductor-related stocks rose after chip equipment maker ASML's quarterly orders topped estimates, with focus also on a raft of company results and the Federal Reserve's rate verdict later in the day.】

item.title: 阿根廷放松管制沙皇：米莱伊的 "电锯式 "削减将在 2025 年进一步深化
item.description: 阿根廷的放松管制沙皇费德里科-斯图尔泽内格尔（Federico Sturzenegger）在带头对公共部门和繁文缛节发起了世界上最猛烈的攻击一年之后，计划在今年进行更大幅度的削减，目标瞄准从汽车到医药等行业。【原文：Argentina's deregulation tsar Federico Sturzenegger, after a year spearheading one of the world's most aggressive attacks on the public sector and red tape, plans even deeper cuts this year, with sights set on industries from autos to medicines.】

item.title: 独家报道部长称秘鲁计划出售债券为不断膨胀的财政赤字融资
item.description: 秘鲁是世界第二大铜出口国。秘鲁经济部长何塞-阿里斯塔（José Arista）告诉路透社记者，在去年经济增长略高于预期之后，秘鲁计划在今年发行多达三种主权债券，为其不断膨胀的财政赤字融资。【原文：Peru, the world's no. 2 copper exporter, plans to issue up to three sovereign bonds this year to finance its ballooning fiscal deficit after economic growth edged above forecasts last year, Economy Minister José Arista told Reuters.】

item.title: 美元在美联储决议前保持稳定
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）做出政策决定之前，美元汇率周三趋于稳定，投资者正密切关注今年利率可能下降多少的暗示，同时他们普遍预计央行将暂时维持政策不变。【原文：The dollar steadied on Wednesday ahead of the U.S. Federal Reserve's policy decision, with investors on edge for hints of how much interest rates might fall this year, while they broadly expect the central bank to keep policy unchanged for now.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车收购 Northvolt 在电动汽车电池合资企业 NOVO 的股份
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周三表示，已签署协议收购陷入困境的瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt 在其合资电池企业 NOVO Energy 中的股份，但未透露价格。【原文：Volvo Cars has signed an agreement to buy struggling Swedish battery maker Northvolt's stake in their joint battery venture NOVO Energy, the Sweden-based automaker said on Wednesday, without disclosing the price.】

item.title: 投资委员会称 TikTok 将向泰国数据托管项目投资 38 亿美元
item.description: 泰国投资委员会周三表示，ByteDance 旗下的 TikTok 将投资 1,268 亿泰铢（约合 37.6 亿美元）在泰国开展数据托管服务。【原文：ByteDance's TikTok will invest 126.8 billion baht ($3.76 billion) in a data hosting service in Thailand, the country's investment board said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 萌芽希望破灭，LVMH拖累奢侈品股价下跌
item.description: 奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的股票在周三早盘交易中下跌，此前该公司的年终报告令投资者失望，他们希望这个行业的风向标能出现更强劲的反弹迹象。【原文：Shares in luxury conglomerate LVMH were down in early trade on Wednesday, after the company's end-of-year report disappointed investors hoping for stronger signs of rebound from the sector bellwether.】

item.title: 瑞典央行下调政策利率 警惕经济疲软
item.description: 瑞典中央银行周三将其关键政策利率从预期的2.50%下调至2.25%，以促进疲软的经济增长，并表示其对利率的预测保持不变，但随时准备在价格和活动前景发生变化时采取行动。【原文：Sweden's central bank cut its key policy rate to 2.25% from 2.50% as expected on Wednesday to boost sluggish economic growth and said its forecast for interest rates held though it stood ready to act if the outlook for prices and activity changed.】

item.title: 日本将与贝森特就外汇和其他问题进行合作
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）和美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三举行视频电话会议后表示，双方将在外汇等问题上开展合作。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato and U.S. Treasury secretary Scott Bessent will cooperate on issues including forex, Kato said on Wednesday, following a video conference call between the two officials.】

item.title: ASML 盈利强劲提振科技股，欧股再创新高
item.description: 周三，欧洲股市攀升至历史新高，芯片设备制造商 ASML 在公布强劲的季度业绩后带领科技股走高。【原文：European shares climbed a record high on Wednesday, as chip equipment maker ASML led technology stocks higher after reporting strong quarterly results.】

item.title: 雷诺和沃尔沃电动货车部门赢得新订单
item.description: 雷诺和沃尔沃汽车制造商与达飞轮船管理集团（CMA CGM）的合资企业 Flexis 周二表示，已收到 10 家欧洲运输和配送公司的意向书，订购其 15,000 辆新型电动厢式货车。【原文：Flexis, a joint venture between automakers Renault and Volvo as well as shipper CMA CGM, said on Tuesday it has received letters of intent from 10 European transport and distribution companies for orders of 15,000 units of its new electric van.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金因科技繁荣创下 2,220 亿美元的年度利润纪录
item.description: 在去年科技股大涨的推动下，挪威 1.8 万亿美元的主权财富基金--世界上最大的主权财富基金--周三公布，其年度利润达到创纪录的 2.51 万亿挪威克朗（约合 2220 亿美元）。【原文：Norway's $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, reported on Wednesday a record annual profit of 2.51 trillion crowns ($222 billion), driven by last year's tech rally.】

item.title: 英伟达股价跳涨，在与 DeepSeek 有关的下跌后反弹
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）股票周三在欧洲跳涨，表明这家处于人工智能市场繁荣核心的公司股价在本周因中国 DeepSeek 人工智能工具崛起而暴跌后可能进一步回升。【原文：Nvidia stock jumped in Europe on Wednesday, suggesting shares in the company at the heart of the artificial intelligence markets boom may recover further after a steep drop this week triggered by the rise of China's DeepSeek AI tool.】

item.title: 预订强劲，ASML 股价大涨
item.description: 周三，ASML 股价在法兰克福早盘交易中大幅上涨，此前该公司的季度业绩表现强劲。【原文：ASML shares rose sharply in early Frankfurt trading on Wednesday following strong quarterly bookings.】

item.title: 销售增长乏力，LVMH 集团股价下跌
item.description: 周三，LVMH 集团股价在法兰克福早盘交易中下跌，原因是该奢侈品集团公布的销售增长未能给投资者留下深刻印象，而在此之前，该集团的竞争对手接连发布强劲业绩，且近期股价上涨。【原文：Shares in LVMH fell in early Frankfurt trading on Wednesday, as sales growth posted by the luxury goods group failed to impress investors, following a string of strong results from rivals and recent price gains.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，大众汽车考虑在美国为奥迪和保时捷品牌建立生产基地
item.description: 据《德国商报》（Handelsblatt）周三报道，德国汽车制造商大众汽车正考虑在美国为其高端品牌奥迪和保时捷建立生产基地，以避免受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收关税的影响。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen is considering setting up production sites in the United States for its high-end Audi and Porsche brands to avert fallout from tariffs threatened by President Donald Trump, Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于中国市场恶化，雷米预计全年销售额降幅将在低位徘徊
item.description: 人头马君度集团周三表示，目前预计 2024/25 财年全年集团销售额的有机降幅将接近 18%，处于指导目标的下限，原因是美国需求复苏的时间尚不明朗，中国市场状况也在恶化。【原文：Remy Cointreau said on Wednesday it now expected the decline in full year 2024/25 group sales to be close to 18% on an organic basis, at the lower end of its guidance target, citing lack of visibility on the timing of a recovery in demand in the United States and worsening market conditions in China.】
